results.text: But you, O God, do see trouble and grief; you consider it to take it in hand. The victim commits himself to you; you are the helper of the fatherless.
results.reason: Deepens trust and belief in God's goodness
results.reflection: Faith opens our hearts to experience God's miraculous work.

results.text: Yet he was merciful; he forgave their iniquities and did not destroy them. Time after time he restrained his anger and did not stir up his full wrath.
results.reason: Teaches mercy and the freedom of forgiveness
results.reflection: Forgiveness frees us from bitterness and opens doors to healing.

results.text: Why are you downcast, O my soul? Why so disturbed within me? Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise him, my Savior and my God.
results.reflection: Our hope is anchored in God's eternal promises and faithfulness.

results.text: The LORD reigns, he is robed in majesty; the LORD is robed in majesty and is armed with strength. The world is firmly established; it cannot be moved.
results.reason: Provides power and resilience for life's challenges
results.reflection: Divine strength enables us to overcome any obstacle we face.

results.text: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, you preserve my life; you stretch out your hand against the anger of my foes, with your right hand you save me.
results.reason: Provides insight and understanding for daily decisions
results.reflection: True wisdom comes from seeking God's guidance in all things.
